mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and media for mobile to reduce load time and improve scrolling performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress images and implement lazy loading for non-critical assets to improve speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve content hierarchy and add more internal links to boost on-page SEO.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and enhance search filters for quicker access to key content.
tips: Consider implementing a chatbot for faster customer service responses.
Ensure the website is accessible and user-friendly for all visitors, including those with disabilities.
